II.i.1.B.2.b
.
Gaining Access to the Tracking Portal
To obtain new-user access to the tracking portal, contact GDIT support at
fcs-support@gdit.com
.Â  The vendor will coordinate with OBI to establish access and apply the correct permissions.
Notes
:
Vendors provide login instructions within 48 hours of submission of the form if access is granted.
Because portal access is limited, notify the
VCIP mailbox
if a user no longer requires access.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Veterans Claims Intake Program (VCIP) Shipping
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
